about_the_game:
SUMMARY

Can you escape from Puzzledorf, the land of puzzles? This world is full of vibrant, block-pushing puzzles where simplicity meets surprising solutions. This game will help teach you how to solve puzzles as you go; a puzzle game for everyone.

Includes:

  • Solve puzzle mazes by pushing blocks

  • Match the correct colours

  • Colour blind options

  • Undo Mistakes

  • Mirror Mode

  • Classic block-pushing + Ice sliding puzzles

  • Steam Achievements and Local High Scores

  • Cloud Saves on Steam (Play on any PC and continue where you last played)

  • Different bright, colourful worlds

  • Relaxing Music

The demo has a limited number of levels. Puzzledorf is a fun way to exercise your brain whilst immersing yourself in the vibrant, 2D art.


STEAM USER REVIEWS

"I was motivated enough to 100% it. That must say something about the quality, right?" - Lord Victor

"I cannot pin it down but this Sokoban has something." - Thisha

"It unexpectedly pulls you into a world you didn't know you were missing from... A game that calms you and raises your intelligence... It doesn't make you feel stupid; instead, it provides a strange level of clarity, making you instantly feel smarter." - Pweruvian

"This game is amazing! Really enjoying the vibes." - Summoners Drift

"If I were to describe Puzzledorf in one word, it would be 'elegant'." - AP

"Really cute, well done puzzle game, the charm of the graphics style and the super satisfying retro sound effects are great... challenging without being infuriatingly difficult." - Kat

"You will not be disappointed with this little gem of a game." - swcoghlan

STEAM CURATOR REVIEWS

"Charming traditional sokoban game with a great difficulty curve that's been receiving continuous updates for three years. The very definition of a passion project!" - Hidden Indie Gems"Puzzledorf is full of surprisingly difficult puzzles that will have you scratching your head up until your 'a-ha' moment. So much love went into this game and it shows. Absolute hidden gem!" - Hands-Off Gaming

"Fun, challenging and very addictive Sokoban game, with very relaxing music and a chilled vibe." - Indie Gems

"Puzzledorf, Smoothly blends in tactical and strategic play giving the player full control how to figure out the complex puzzle, plan where you want to place the piece's before you make your move." - Indie Recommendations

"Really clever puzzle game with some really unique mechanics! The art style is cute and retro. The music is fun and funky." - The Indie Game Collective

"Puzzledorf is a very good sokoban game, with smooth mechanics, tantalizing puzzles, enough content to keep you busy for hours, and a great soundtrack that is dreamy and relaxing." - Indie Blast

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20, 18, Centos 7
  • Processor: x86, x64
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple or Intel
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 240 MB available space

name: Puzzledorf

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10, 11
  • Processor: x86, x64
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews:
“The classic box pushing puzzle game is especially fun if set up well, and Puzzeldorf is short, sweet, but immensely satisfying... The soundtrack is highly recommended if you want a very soothing soundtrack to relax to.”
94/100 – CCGR

“This is truly an amazing puzzle game.”
9/10 – Chocklah
short_description: Can you escape the land of puzzles? Solve puzzle mazes to find your way out!
